name: freedombox
description: FreedomBox is a personal server operating system that makes hosting your own apps like VPN, file sharing, chat, and more easy via a web UI. Designed for ease of use and privacy using Debian as the base system.
features: Personal Server: All-in-one server OS, VPN, file sharing, chat, Web UI management. Easy self-hosting for everyone.
Privacy-Focused: Built for data ownership. Secure by design.
Debian-Based: Stable and reliable. Trusted foundation.
App Ecosystem: Pre-configured services. One-click deployment.
VPN Server: Secure remote access. Privacy protection.
File Sharing: Host your own cloud. Data ownership.
Chat Server: Private messaging. Secure communication.
Web UI: Easy management. No command line needed.
Automatic Updates: Stay secure. Hassle-free maintenance.
Low-Power: Runs on Raspberry Pi. Energy efficient.
